name: Hide & Spook: The Haunted Alchemist
summary:
Hide & Spook is a party game for 3 players for the HTC Vive!

The Alchemist wears the headset, while the two Ghosts take a controller each and sneak around the room trying to extinguish the candles!

The Alchemist tries to catch them by staring at them and thus dispelling them from this earthly dimension, returning them back from where they came!
